dmca.title: Wiley complains of copied e-books
dmca.body:
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints:
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights said owner being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc., a global publisher of books, journals, and other products, or one of its related companies (
